name: Vijay Corporation
overview:
Established in the year 2008, “Vijay Corporation”, is counted among the promising manufacturers, suppliers and wholesalers of a comprehensive assortment of Hardware Accessories, Plastic Accessories and Textile Accessories.

Our Products: Magnetic Door Catcher Door Catcher Plastic Accessories Textile Accessories Four Wheel Caster Six Wheel Caster Ball Caster

Our Team: We have a firm belief that the success and growth of any organization is propelled by the efficient support of the team of talented professionals and we are proud to have such kind of workforce with us.

Our Quality: Our organization has able to strengthen its pole position in this competitive market, by managing the excellent quality of the range of Hardware Accessories, Plastic Accessories and Textile Accessories delivered.

Infrastructure: Our organization is well-supported by a modern infrastructure facility, which aid us to offer several types of innovative range of Hardware Accessories, Plastic Accessories and Textile Accessories to the clients.

Client Satisfaction: Ever since our establishment, we have paid utmost attention on gaining complete satisfaction and maintaining strong rapport with customers. Keeping in mind the same, we ensure that the clients receive products that are manufactured using high grade raw material, procured only from distinguished vendors of the industry.
